trans-unit.source: Represents a container for controls in a ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 代表功能區中的控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonToggleButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonCheckBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls.png "Ribbon controls") Ribbon controls The following illustration shows how some of these controls appear when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: ![功能區控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls.png "功能區控制項")功能區的控制項下圖顯示 選取此選項，其中某些控制項的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon controls that are selected](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls-selection.png "Ribbon controls that are selected") Ribbon controls that are selected
trans-unit.target: ![功能區選取的控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-controls-selection.png "功能區選取的控制項")功能區選取的控制項

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref>對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition> contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>包含指定的映像和控制項相關聯的標籤的大小和可見性資訊的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"> </xref>對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否裝載於<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項裝載於<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInControlGroup*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否裝載於快速存取工具列。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項裝載在快速存取工具列。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInQuickAccessToolBar*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInQuickAccessToolBar*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.IsInQuickAccessToolBar*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the data template changes.
trans-unit.target: 資料範本變更時叫用。

trans-unit.source: The old data template.
trans-unit.target: 舊的資料範本。

trans-unit.source: The new data template.
trans-unit.target: 新的資料範本。
